document.full_text: a former goldman sachs group inc  programer, sentenced to eight years in prison for stealing part of the bank's high-frequency trading code, should never have been charged, his lawyer argued on tuesday in a bid to have him released while he appeals.
document.title: convicted ex-goldman programmer bids for release
lines_and_colors: a former goldman sachs group inc  programer, sentenced to eight years in prison for stealing part of the bank's high-frequency trading code, should never have been charged, his lawyer argued on tuesday in a bid to have him released while he appeals.
